ims_translate

Class YandexTranslatorAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • ims_translate.YandexTranslatorAPI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Detect, Translate

    public abstract class YandexTranslatorAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    Makes the generic Yandex API calls. Different service classes can then extend this to make the specific service calls.
